messages.title: Working for real change in Winchester
messages.content: Martin Tod lives and works in the heart of Winchester with his wife Michaela. An active volunteer with local environmental and homelessness groups, Martin has helped raise thousands of pounds for local charities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for more NHS services - especially more ambulances in rural areas.
Campaigning for green jobs and action to tackle climate change.

issues.health: Campaigning for more NHS services - especially more ambulances in rural areas.

leaflet.personalStatement: Working for real change in Winchester
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains an endorsement from Nick Clegg for 'a fair deal for our Armed Forces' and includes a petition related to this issue.
